CustomField.description: Checks related Implementation to see if the call has been completed.
CustomField.formula: IF((Implementation__r.Intro_Call_Complete__c = TRUE && CONTAINS(Subject, "Introductory")), TRUE, IF((Implementation__r.Census_Call_Complete__c = TRUE && CONTAINS(Subject, "Add Your Employees")), TRUE, IF((Implementation__r.Funding_Call_Complete__c = TRUE && CONTAINS(Subject, "Final Review and Funding")), TRUE, FALSE)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Checks related Implementation to see if the call has been completed.
CustomField.label: Imp Call Complete
